title: Text Indexes
subject: MongoDB
theory: Text indexes support search queries on string content. They enable text search features like stop words and stemming.

examples.explanation: Returns docs containing 'mongodb', sorted by match quality.

common_mistakes.correction: A collection can have at most ONE text index (which can cover multiple fields).

real_world_use_cases.description: Searching titles and bodies of articles.

exam_notes: Supports logical OR of terms by default.
summary: Text indexes provide basic full-text search capabilities within MongoDB.
